AlmostBigger(double, double, double)

Computes whether a value is almost greater than another given an acceptable difference.

public static bool AlmostBigger(double value1, double value2, double acceptableDifference = 1E-07)

Parameters

value1 double

The value to compare.

value2 double

The value to compare against.

acceptableDifference double

The acceptable difference. Defaults to DOUBLE_EPSILON.

Returns

bool

Whether value1 is almost greater than value2.
